snippet: Our apartment has an old, awkward kitchen, but we don’t have the budget to renovate before selling. Should we get plans drawn up, so buyers can see what’s possible?
abstract: Market Ready Q&A column offers homeowners advice on how to present the possibilities for renovating an old, awkward kitchen to potential buyers.
lead_paragraph: Our apartment has an old, awkward kitchen, but we don’t have the budget to renovate before selling. Should we get plans drawn up, so buyers can see what’s possible?

headline.seo: Selling an Apartment With a Kitchen in Need of a Renovation
